EmailTemplate.name: EMEA_Event_Open House & DTF_Dubai_Q416.Confirmation
EmailTemplate.subject: Confirmation: Pivotal Digital Transformation Forum
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://pivotal.io/event/digital-transformation-forum/dubai]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Thank you for registering for the upcoming Digital Transformation Forum in Dubai. See event details below:
Date: 1 November 2016 {{my.Save the Date}} Time: 8h30 - 15h00 Location: The St. Regis Dubai <[[http://www.stregisdubai.com/]]>, Al Habtoor City, Sheikh Zayed Road, PO Box 124405, Dubai, UAE
We look forward to meeting you soon!
The Pivotal Team
Questions? Please contact Phil Reay at preay@pivotal.io <[[mailto:preay@pivotal.io]]>.
